name: Qbert
description:
A close re-creation of the 1982 arcade game "Q*bert". Move Q*bert with the arrow keys or WASD to light up every cube of the pyramid and avoid enemies along the way.  Spinning platforms will carry Qbert to the top of the pyramid and allow you to kill enemies. Red and purple enemies hurt Qbert, while green enemies can (and should) be touched. This project has many SFX from the original game!

--> Please Full-screen for the best experience!

--> Highscores do not work in the browser, please download the game if you would like to see/record high scores!
